Security Officer

Company: Green Cascades Developers
Location: Visakhapatnam Rural mandal, India
LinkedIn post
Job Title: Security Officer

[Local Candidates Preferred]

About Us

Green Cascades is a Real Estate Development firm, founded in 2003 by a successful Technology and Real Estate Entrepreneur. Green Cascades has developed multiple Commercial Buildings, Residential Layouts, Single-Family Residences, and Industrial Properties, taking pride in our ability to enhance Real Asset Value.

Function

Property Management

Location

Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, India

Start Date

Immediate

Application Deadline

15 October 2024

Reports to

Property Manager

Roles

Security

Responsibilities

  • Ensure the security and safety of all properties, 24/7.
  • Conduct monthly reviews of the security system and implement necessary improvements.
  • Deter unauthorized individuals from entering or damaging properties.
  • Operate company vehicles for security patrols and other related duties.
  • (Optional) Provide armed security if you are ex-military or ex-police and qualify for a firearms license.

Previous Experience

10+ Years

Ideal Candidate

  • Under 35 years
  • Well-kept and professional appearance
  • Non-alcoholic
  • Proficient in the use of technology
  • Preference and higher salary for ex-police and ex-military candidates who qualify for a firearms license
  • LOCAL (currently residing in the Visakhapatnam Metropolitan Region)

Time Commitment

Approximately 72 hours weekly

Monthly Salary Range

₹15,000 - ₹30,000

Why Join Green Cascades?

At Green Cascades, We Believe In Fostering a Work Environment That Is Not Only Productive But Also Fulfilling. As Part Of Our Team, You Will Be Working With a Firm That Values Innovation, Dedication, And Excellence. We Offer

  • Competitive salary and benefits
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development
  • A supportive and dynamic work culture
  • The chance to be part of a company that is shaping the future of real estate development in Visakhapatnam and beyond

Application Process

Interested candidates are invited to submit their applications by 15 October 2024. We look forward to welcoming a dedicated and professional Security Officer to our team.

Apply now and take the next step in your career with Green Cascades.
